attributes.action: Reduce or remove vat from home insulation and energy saving products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By reducing the cost of insulation more households could increase the thickness of loft insulation thus saving on heating bills. This would have a secondary benefit in it would reduce the carbon dioxide emissions of the UK.
Reductions in the cost of energy saving lighting would also reduce emissions.
